definition: Rabiye or Rebiya (name)/Rebiya Kadeer or Rabiye Qadir (1947-), Uighur businesswoman and activist, imprisoned 1999-2005, then president of the World Uighur Congress
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent
Belgium/Belgian/abbr. for 比利時|比利时[Bi3 li4 shi2]
to compare/(followed by a noun and adjective) more {adj.} than {noun}/ratio/to gesture/(Taiwan pr. [bi4] in some compounds derived from Classical Chinese)
Rebiya Kadeer or Rabiye Qadir (1947-), Uighur businesswoman and activist, imprisoned 1999-2005, then president of the World Uighur Congress
pinyin: Re4 bi3 ya4 · Ka3 de2 er3

sentences.chinese: 熱比婭否認了這一指控。

sentences.english: The ministry accused her of engaging in anti-Chinese separatist activities.
sentences.chinese: 中國外交部指責熱比婭參與反中國的分裂活動。
